abstract: Steven Spielberg movie Bridge of Spies alludes to later negotiations between lawyer James B Donovan, who is played by Tom Hanks in film, and former Cuban Pres Fidel Castro following 1961 Bay of Pigs invasion.
lead_paragraph: After he negotiated the exchange of a Soviet spy for an American one, Mr. Donovan was sent to Cuba to talk to Fidel Castro about Bay of Pigs prisoners.

headline.main: What James Donovan Did After the Bridge of Spies

snippet: After he negotiated the exchange of a Soviet spy for an American one, Mr. Donovan was sent to Cuba to talk to Fidel Castro about Bay of Pigs prisoners.
